alert.note: Alert for Bienville; Bossier; Caddo; De Soto; Natchitoches; Red River; Webster; Winn (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 4:35PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Webster, Jackson, De Soto, Red River, northwestern Natchitoches, southern Caddo, Bienville, southeastern Bossier, western Lincoln and northwestern Winn Parishes through 530 PM CDT... At 434 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles east of Jonesboro to 6 miles north of Campti to near Converse. Movement was northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ruston, Mansfield, Grambling, Jonesboro, Arcadia, Coushatta, Stonewall, Ringgold, Gibsland, Heflin, Dubach, Simsboro, Martin, Hodge, Goldonna, North Hodge, Vienna, South Mansfield, Hall Summit and Keachi. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Bienville; Bossier; Caddo; De Soto; Natchitoches; Red River; Webster; Winn
